io.reinert.requestor.serialization

Interface Serializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type it can serialize
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Serdes<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonBooleanSerdes, JsonNumberSerdes, JsonObjectSerdes, JsonSerdes, JsonStringSerdes, JsonValueSerdes, OverlaySerdes, TextSerdes, TurboOverlaySerdes, VoidSerdes

    public interface Serializer<T>
    Performs serialization of types.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<T> handledType()
      Method for accessing type of the Object this serializer can handle.
      String[] mediaType()
      Tells the media-type patterns which this serializer handles.
      String serialize(Collection<T> c, SerializationContext context)
      Serialize a collection of T to plain text.

      Serialize T to plain text.

    • Method Detail

      • handledType

        Class<T> handledType()
        Method for accessing type of the Object this serializer can handle.
        Returns:
        The class which this serializer can serialize

      • mediaType

        String[] mediaType()
        Tells the media-type patterns which this serializer handles.

        E.g., a serializer for JSON can return {"application/json", "application/javascript"}.
        If you want to create a serializer for any media-type just return "*/*".

        Returns:
        The media-type patterns handled by this serializer.

      • serialize

        String serialize(T t,
               SerializationContext context)
        Serialize T to plain text.
        Parameters:
        t - The object to be serialized
        context - Context of the serialization
        Returns:
        The object serialized.

      • serialize

        String serialize(Collection<T> c,
               SerializationContext context)
        Serialize a collection of T to plain text.
        Parameters:
        c - The collection of the object to be serialized
        context - Context of the serialization
        Returns:
        The object serialized.
